participant_2.background:
I play basketball.
I am an athlete.
I get paid over 5 million a year to dribble a ball.
I was drafted last years by the minnesota wolves.
I went to the university of north carolina.

content.text: I'm so glad we matched! I'm a big fan of basketball. I love watching the games and playing them.
Me too! I'm a professional basketball player. I play for the Minnesota Timberwolves.
That's awesome! What's it like being a professional athlete?
It's a lot of work, but it's also a lot of fun. I love being able to play the game I love for a living.
That's great! I can imagine it's a lot of pressure, too.
It can be, but I try to focus on having fun and playing my best.
What's your favorite part about being a basketball player?
I love the competition and the adrenaline rush of playing in front of a crowd.
That's what I love about it too! I've always dreamed of being a professional basketball player.
You should go for it! You never know what could happen.
Thanks for the encouragement! I'll definitely keep it in mind.
So, what do you do for fun when you're not watching or playing basketball?
I like to go to yoga classes, go on vacation, and spend time with my friends and family.
That sounds like a lot of fun! I love going on vacation too.
Where have you been on vacation recently?
I just got back from Italy. It was an amazing trip!
I've always wanted to go to Italy. What was it like?
It was incredible! The food was amazing, the people were friendly, and the scenery was breathtaking.
That sounds like a dream come true!
It was! I'm so glad I went.
So, what's next for you?
I'm not sure yet. I'm just enjoying the ride for now.
That's the best way to live!
